entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is mentioned as being furious and supportive of Harry's ambition to become an Auror.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: One of the fifth-year students at Hogwarts, practicing incantations under her breath.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who is rereading a book on Charms and appears to be struggling with it.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who is having trouble eating breakfast due to clumsiness.

relationships.description: McGonagall has declared that she will help Harry become an Auror if it is the last thing she does.
The salt cellar in front of Parvati is twitching, suggesting that her incantations are having an effect on it.
Hermione is rereading a book on Charms, indicating that she is trying to learn or improve her skills.
Neville keeps dropping his knife and fork during breakfast.
Harry's ambition to become an Auror is supported by McGonagall.
